packages.name: DemoStatusBar
packages.author: SparseTweaks
packages.description: Overrides the Status Bar & Lock Screen to display information as if it were a Demo device.
packages.long_description: Overrides the Status Bar & Lock Screen to display information as if it were a Demo device.

packages.name: Springify
packages.author: SparseTweaks
packages.long_description: This tweak targets com.apple.springboard.plist to bring 15+ SpringBoard tweaks. Disable annoying SpringBoard features like Breadcrumbs and Low Power Alerts, and enable features such as WiFi RSSI.
